hints.content:
Dian made $\goldE{83}$ paper boats.

![A number line is labeled 83 on the right end and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d0291a6f26dd1442865bf2ccfb5405aff4a2d98f)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

$\maroonD{25}$ of Dian's boats sank.

![From the right at 83 with minus 25 goes to 58. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b657037e094c8526b2e53296dc39cc2ae86ece7)

$\goldE{83} - \maroonD{25} = 58$

$\purpleD{33}$ boats had a rip in them.

![From the right at 83 with minus 25 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/906e467ee90f92c7ffc1cc0c0fda37b35a2c831a)

$58 - \purpleD{33} =25$

$\blueE{13}$ boats were eaten by fish.

![A number line starts at 12 on the left and goes to 83 on the right. From the right at 83 with minus 25 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 13 goes to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0112da3f862586567c830d1d07c56aa2742d2965)

$25 - \blueE{13} = 12$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 83 on the right. From the right at 83 with minus 25 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 13 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fade79cc0cf2df0b4c418cad7351b409e79522c0)

Dian has ${12}$ boats left.

question.content:
Dian made $83$ paper boats and then set them afloat on a lake.

$25$ of Dian's boats sank, $33$ boats were ripped, and $13$ were eaten by fish.    

**Which number line shows how to find how many boats Dian has left?**

[[☃ radio 1]]  

**How many boats does Dian have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] boats

choices.content: ![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 93 on the right. From the right at 93 with minus 25 goes to 68. From 68 minus 33 goes to 35. From 35 minus 13 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/08d1b8a38c8ae7c3cccdd9b7d5c83dbde376d996)

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 83 on the right. From the right at 83 with minus 25 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 13 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fade79cc0cf2df0b4c418cad7351b409e79522c0)
